name: vinculo_precificacao
description: Precificacao Vinculo is a comprehensive resource for designers seeking to price their projects effectively and fairly. Our webpage provides detailed explanations and links to a sellable digital product: a spreadsheet tool designed to streamline the pricing process for design projects. Whether you're a freelance designer or a design agency, PriceCalc empowers you to make informed pricing decisions and maximize your profitability.

scripts.optimize: uglifyjs js/*.js -o js/script.min.js && npm run optimize-css

author: carla_mendes
